mapper.update: update IPO_EXPRESS set ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COST = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPRESS_DATE = #{expressDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RECEIVER = #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EXPRESS_ID = #{expressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select EXPRESS_ID, ADDRESS, COST, EXPRESS_DATE, RECEIVER, TEL from IPO_EXPRESS
